GSD.description:
PCI: endpoint: Fix alignment fault error in copy tests

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.17.3 by commit 6d16d35fad657acc7aa479e6686724a383792bd9. For more details please see the references link.
